issue.title: [Developer] Autotune more things
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8489](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8489). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-7801 added the "autotune" comment bot to fix linting errors and rebuild some generated files. cmake-format was left off because of Python problems (see description on https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6932). And there's probably other things we want to add (autopep8 for python, and similar for other languages?)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8489?focusedCommentId=17191635) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Takeing care of cmake-format in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9929
